description: Simple whatsapp bot for groups and personal chats ; Master script

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: the bot will automatically read all statuses (yes to enable, no to disable)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: the bot will automatically download all statuses (yes to enable, no to disable)

MENU_THEME.description:
Add one or more image or video links for your bot; example: link1,link2,link3......
 Or put the name of a THEME among the available themes

PM_PERMIT.description: Commands will not work in private for other users (yes to enable, no to disable)

MODE_PUBLIC.description: yes for public mode or no for private mode (in this case, only you will use the bot)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert the name you entered (APP NAME) at the very beginning of the page

PRESENCE.description: mark your presence: 1 to show you are online even if you are not. 2 to show you are typing a message. 3 to show you are recording an audio. Or leave the field empty to show your real status.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Your phone number; it must be in the format ID+number

WARN_COUNT.description: this is the warning limit count

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: Put yes if you want to receive the bot's starting message in private or no if you don't want it

PM_CHATBOT.description: Put yes if you want the bot to automatically reply to private messages

ANTI_COMMAND_SPAM.description: Add a one-minute cooldown after each command for other users (to enable, choose *yes*)

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: Put yes if you want messages deleted by other users to be sent to you in private

AUTO_REACT_MESSAGE.description: Put yes if you want messages to be automatically reacted to
